## Definition Of Done

| Q                                 | A
| --------------------------------- | ---
| Added tests                       | Todo
| Changelog updated                 | Todo
| Documentation                     | -

`Todo`: Pending / Work in progress
`OK`: Done / Validated
`-`: Not needed
